description:
This update is a must for all bondage fans, and for people who want to improve their rope skills. From beginners to experts, this how-to should not be missed.
In this great tutorial, we slowly go over many of the ties and techniques we use at hogtied to make sure our models are helpless and secure.
We slowly take you through and demonstrate a variety of ties and techniques. The wrist tie/elbow tie. The elusive hair tie. We demonstrate how to properly tie breasts, and how to do a correct neck tie. We take you through how to do an expert Japanese box tie, and how to finish it off into an "Ebi" tie. We show you the correct way to cinch off your ties by demonstrating a great chair tie.
This bonus tutorial will improve your rope skills and help you in your play with your partners. Enjoy!
title: BONDAGE TUTORIAL A bonus update to inform members on basic ties and techniques.
